info.name: a new era (126 bytes)
info.description: This is a port of [url=https://www.pouet.net/prod.php?which=78044]into a new era 64b[/url]  to shadertoy, using the binary operations available in WebGL 2.0. If chrome doesn't compile,  enable WebGL2. You're invited to help me shrink the size of this =)

renderpass.name: Image
